pages.text: Being thought to be one of the more simpler tools of a witch, the Loom is often underrated, however, it is definitely not an unimportant.$(br)Generally, it is used to spin up to four raw materials into a brand new string or silk.$(br)As the enchanting of the product requires powers from beneath the skin, the Loom must be sustained with $(l:tools/altar)Altar Power$().
